Home.ConsentError: you must agree to the terms and conditions.
Home.HomeConsentDescription: SecretChat is a place that lets you create online chat rooms to talk or text with people. You can invite anyone to join your chat room by sending them a link. The texts and links you send will be deleted as soon as everyone leaves the room. No one can access your chat history or see what you shared.
Home.HomeConsentDescriptionSmallScreen: Your privacy is our priority. We take data protection seriously and adhere to strict privacy policies.
Home.Title: SecretChat
